${ModID}:FrontloadedBash.NAME: Frontloaded Bash
${ModID}:FrontloadedBash.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Deals 1 more damage for every !M! cards in your 抽牌堆.
${ModID}:FrontloadedBash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Deals 1 more damage for every !M! cards in your 抽牌堆. NL Draw 1 card.

${ModID}:Preparation.NAME: Preparation
${ModID}:Preparation.DESCRIPTION: Choose an Attack or Skill card. NL Add copy of that card into your hand. NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:Preparation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an Attack or Skill card. NL Add copy of that card into your hand.

${ModID}:SmallAdaptation.NAME: Small Adaptation
${ModID}:SmallAdaptation.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Choose a card that costs 1 or 0. NL Add a copy of that card into your hand.

${ModID}:ExperimentalMerge.NAME: Experimental Merge
${ModID}:ExperimentalMerge.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Shuffle your 弃牌堆 into your 抽牌堆. Draw !M!.

${ModID}:ExhaustiveWork.NAME: Exhaustive Work
${ModID}:ExhaustiveWork.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Choose a card. NL Exhaust that card and add a copy of it to your 抽牌堆.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to Exhaust and copy.

${ModID}:IterativeDesign.NAME: Iterative Design
${ModID}:IterativeDesign.DESCRIPTION: Whenever your create a card 本场战斗, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:ReduceOverhead.NAME: Reduce Overhead
${ModID}:ReduceOverhead.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL cards that have duplicates. NL Deal !D! damage for each card Exhausted. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:MagicHand.NAME: Magic Hand
${ModID}:MagicHand.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! cards from your master deck to add to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn and exhausts.
${ModID}:MagicHand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! cards from your master deck to add to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

${ModID}:EnergyDrink.NAME: Energy Drink
${ModID}:EnergyDrink.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! stslib:Temporary_HP. Gain 1 ${ModID}:Duplication for every 10 cards you shuffle into your 抽牌堆.
